22 UDPBridge::UDPBridge()
23 {
24  auto name = ros::this_node::getNamespace();
25  ROS_INFO_STREAM("namespace: " << name);
26  if(name.size() > 1 && name[0] == '/')
27  {
28  name = name.substr(1);
29  name = topicString(name);
30  }
31  else
32  {
33  name = ros::this_node::getName();
34  if(name.size() > 1 && name[0] == '/')
35  name = name.substr(1);
36  }
37  setName(ros::param::param("~name", name));
38 
39  ROS_INFO_STREAM("name: " << name_);
40 
41 
42  m_port = ros::param::param<int>("~port", m_port);
43  ROS_INFO_STREAM("port: " << m_port);
44 
45  m_max_packet_size = ros::param::param("~maxPacketSize", m_max_packet_size);
46  ROS_INFO_STREAM("maxPacketSize: " << m_max_packet_size);
47 
48  m_socket = socket(AF_INET, SOCK_DGRAM, 0);
49  if(m_socket < 0)
50  {
51  ROS_ERROR("Failed creating socket");
52  exit(1);
53  }
54 
55  sockaddr_in bind_address; // address to listen on
56  memset((char *)&bind_address, 0, sizeof(bind_address));
57  bind_address.sin_family = AF_INET;
58  bind_address.sin_addr.s_addr = htonl(INADDR_ANY);
59  bind_address.sin_port = htons(m_port);
60 
61  if(bind(m_socket, (sockaddr*)&bind_address, sizeof(bind_address)) < 0)
62  {
63  ROS_ERROR("Error binding socket");
64  exit(1);
65  }
66 
67  timeval socket_timeout;
68  socket_timeout.tv_sec = 0;
69  socket_timeout.tv_usec = 1000;
70  if(setsockopt(m_socket, SOL_SOCKET, SO_RCVTIMEO, &socket_timeout, sizeof(socket_timeout)) < 0)
71  {
72  ROS_ERROR("Error setting socket timeout");
73  exit(1);
74  }
75 
76  int buffer_size;
77  unsigned int s = sizeof(buffer_size);
78  getsockopt(m_socket, SOL_SOCKET, SO_RCVBUF, (void*)&buffer_size, &s);
79  ROS_INFO_STREAM("recv buffer size:" << buffer_size);
80  buffer_size = 500000;
81  setsockopt(m_socket, SOL_SOCKET, SO_RCVBUF, &buffer_size, sizeof(buffer_size));
82  getsockopt(m_socket, SOL_SOCKET, SO_RCVBUF, (void*)&buffer_size, &s);
83  ROS_INFO_STREAM("recv buffer size set to:" << buffer_size);
84  buffer_size = 500000;
85  setsockopt(m_socket, SOL_SOCKET, SO_SNDBUF, &buffer_size, sizeof(buffer_size));
86  getsockopt(m_socket, SOL_SOCKET, SO_SNDBUF, (void*)&buffer_size, &s);
87  ROS_INFO_STREAM("send buffer size set to:" << buffer_size);
88 }

90 void UDPBridge::setName(const std::string &name)
91 {
92  name_ = name;
93  if(name_.size() >= maximum_node_name_size-1)
94  {
95  name_ = name_.substr(0, maximum_node_name_size-1);
96  ROS_WARN_STREAM("udp_bridge name truncated to " << name_);
97  }
98 }

102 void UDPBridge::spin()
103 {
104  ros::NodeHandle private_nodeHandle("~");
105  ros::ServiceServer susbcribe_service = private_nodeHandle.advertiseService("remote_subscribe", &UDPBridge::remoteSubscribe, this);
106  ros::ServiceServer advertise_service = private_nodeHandle.advertiseService("remote_advertise", &UDPBridge::remoteAdvertise, this);
107 
108  ros::ServiceServer add_remote_service = private_nodeHandle.advertiseService("add_remote", &UDPBridge::addRemote, this);
109  ros::ServiceServer list_remotes_service = private_nodeHandle.advertiseService("list_remotes", &UDPBridge::listRemotes, this);
110 
111  m_topicStatisticsPublisher = private_nodeHandle.advertise<TopicStatisticsArray>("topic_statistics",10,false);
112  m_bridge_info_publisher = private_nodeHandle.advertise<BridgeInfo>("bridge_info", 1, true);
113 
114  XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue remotes_dict;
115  if(private_nodeHandle.getParam("remotes",remotes_dict))
116  {
117  if(remotes_dict.getType() == XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue::TypeStruct)
118  {
119  for(auto remote:remotes_dict)
120  {
121  Remote remote_info;
122  remote_info.name = remote.first;
123  if(remote.second.hasMember("name"))
124  remote_info.name = std::string(remote.second["name"]);
125 
126  remote_nodes_[remote_info.name] = std::make_shared<RemoteNode>(remote_info.name, name_);
127  remote_nodes_[remote_info.name]->update(remote_info);
128 
129  if(remote.second.hasMember("connections"))
130  for(auto connection_info: remote.second["connections"])
131  {
132  RemoteConnection connection;
133  connection.connection_id = connection_info.first;
134  if(connection_info.second.hasMember("host"))
135  connection.host = std::string(connection_info.second["host"]);
136  connection.port = 0;
137  if(connection_info.second.hasMember("port"))
138  connection.port = int(connection_info.second["port"]);
139  if(connection_info.second.hasMember("returnHost"))
140  connection.return_host = std::string(connection_info.second["returnHost"]);
141  connection.return_port = 0;
142  if(connection_info.second.hasMember("returnPort"))
143  connection.return_port =int(connection_info.second["remotePort"]);
144  remote_info.connections.push_back(connection);
145  remote_nodes_[remote_info.name]->update(remote_info);
146 
147  if(connection_info.second.hasMember("topics"))
148  for(auto topic: connection_info.second["topics"])
149  {
150  int queue_size = 1;
151  if (topic.second.hasMember("queue_size"))
152  queue_size = topic.second["queue_size"];
153  double period = 0.0;
154  if (topic.second.hasMember("period"))
155  period = topic.second["period"];
156  std::string source = topic.first;
157  if (topic.second.hasMember("source"))
158  source = std::string(topic.second["source"]);
159  source = ros::names::resolve(source);
160  std::string destination = source;
161  if (topic.second.hasMember("destination"))
162  destination = std::string(topic.second["destination"]);
163  addSubscriberConnection(source, destination, 1, period, remote_info.name, connection.connection_id);
164  }
165  }
166  }
167  }
168  }
169 
170  ros::Timer statsReportTimer = m_nodeHandle.createTimer(ros::Duration(1.0), &UDPBridge::statsReportCallback, this);
171  ros::Timer bridgeInfoTimer = m_nodeHandle.createTimer(ros::Duration(2.0), &UDPBridge::bridgeInfoCallback, this);
172 
173  while(ros::ok())
174  {
175  sockaddr_in remote_address;
176  socklen_t remote_address_length = sizeof(remote_address);
177  while(true)
178  {
179  pollfd p;
180  p.fd = m_socket;
181  p.events = POLLIN;
182  int ret = poll(&p, 1, 10);
183  if(ret < 0)
184  ROS_WARN_STREAM("poll error: " << int(errno) << " " << strerror(errno));
185  if(ret > 0 && p.revents & POLLIN)
186  {
187  int receive_length = 0;
188  std::vector<uint8_t> buffer;
189  int buffer_size;
190  unsigned int buffer_size_size = sizeof(buffer_size);
191  getsockopt(m_socket,SOL_SOCKET,SO_RCVBUF,&buffer_size,&buffer_size_size);
192  buffer.resize(buffer_size);
193  receive_length = recvfrom(m_socket, &buffer.front(), buffer_size, 0, (sockaddr*)&remote_address, &remote_address_length);
194  if(receive_length > 0)
195  {
196  SourceInfo source_info;
197  source_info.host = addressToDotted(remote_address);
198  source_info.port = ntohs(remote_address.sin_port);
199  buffer.resize(receive_length);
200  decode(buffer, source_info);
201  }
202  }
203  else
204  break;
205  }
206  for(auto remote: remote_nodes_)
207  {
208  if(remote.second)
209  {
210  int discard_count = remote.second->defragmenter().cleanup(ros::Duration(5));
211  if(discard_count)
212  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Discarded " << discard_count << " incomplete packets from " << remote.first);
213  }
214  }
215  cleanupSentPackets();
216  resendMissingPackets();
217  ros::spinOnce();
218  }
219 }
220 
221 void UDPBridge::callback(const topic_tools::ShapeShifter::ConstPtr& msg, const std::string &topic_name)
222 {
223  ros::Time now = ros::Time::now();
224 
225  RemoteConnectionsList need_type_info_list;
226  for(auto remote_connection: m_subscribers[topic_name].remote_connections)
227  {
228  if(now - remote_connection.second.last_info_sent_time > ros::Duration(5.0))
229  {
230  need_type_info_list[remote_connection.first.first].push_back(remote_connection.first.second);
231  remote_connection.second.last_info_sent_time = now;
232  }
233  }
234 
235  if(!need_type_info_list.empty())
236  {
237  TopicTypeInfo tti;
238  tti.source_topic = topic_name;
239  tti.datatype = msg->getDataType();
240  tti.md5sum = msg->getMD5Sum();
241  tti.message_definition = msg->getMessageDefinition();
242  for(auto remote: need_type_info_list)
243  for(auto connection: remote.second)
244  {
245  tti.destination_topic = m_subscribers[topic_name].remote_connections[std::make_pair(remote.first, connection)].destination_topic;
246  RemoteConnectionsList need_type_info;
247  need_type_info[remote.first].push_back(connection);
248  overhead_statistics_.add(send(tti, need_type_info));
249  }
250  }
251 
252  RemoteConnectionsList destinations;
253 
254  for(auto remote_connection: m_subscribers[topic_name].remote_connections)
255  {
256  if(remote_connection.second.period >= 0)
257  if(remote_connection.second.period == 0 || now-remote_connection.second.last_sent_time > ros::Duration(remote_connection.second.period))
258  {
259  destinations[remote_connection.first.first].push_back(remote_connection.first.second);
260  remote_connection.second.last_sent_time = now;
261  }
262  }
263 
264  SizeData size_data;
265  size_data.message_size = msg->size();
266  size_data.timestamp = now;
267  size_data.send_results[""][""];
268  m_subscribers[topic_name].statistics.add(size_data);
269  if (destinations.empty())
270  return;
271 
272  local_topic_types_[topic_name] = msg->getDataType();
273 
274  // First, serialize message in a MessageInternal message
275  MessageInternal message;
276 
277  message.source_topic = topic_name;
278 
279 
280  message.data.resize(msg->size());
281 
282  ros::serialization::OStream stream(message.data.data(), msg->size());
283  msg->write(stream);
284 
285  size_data = send(message, destinations);
286  m_subscribers[topic_name].statistics.add(size_data);
287 
288 }
289 
295 void UDPBridge::decode(std::vector<uint8_t> const &message, const SourceInfo& source_info)
296 {
297  if(message.empty())
298  {
299  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("empty message from: " << source_info.node_name << " " << source_info.host << ":" << source_info.port);
300  return;
301  }
302 
303  const Packet *packet = reinterpret_cast<const Packet*>(message.data());
304  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("Received packet of type " << int(packet->type) << " and size " << message.size() << " from '" << source_info.node_name << "' (" << source_info.host << ":" << source_info.port << ")");
305  std::shared_ptr<RemoteNode> remote_node;
306  auto remote_node_iterator = remote_nodes_.find(source_info.node_name);
307  if(remote_node_iterator != remote_nodes_.end())
308  remote_node = remote_node_iterator->second;
309  switch(packet->type)
310  {
311  case PacketType::Data:
312  decodeData(message, source_info);
313  break;
314  case PacketType::Compressed:
315  decode(uncompress(message), source_info);
316  break;
317  case PacketType::SubscribeRequest:
318  decodeSubscribeRequest(message, source_info);
319  break;
320  case PacketType::TypeInfo:
321  decodeTopicTypeInfo(message, source_info);
322  break;
323  case PacketType::Fragment:
324  if(remote_node)
325  if(remote_node->defragmenter().addFragment(message))
326  for(auto p: remote_node->defragmenter().getPackets())
327  decode(p, source_info);
328  break;
329  case PacketType::BridgeInfo:
330  decodeBridgeInfo(message, source_info);
331  break;
332  case PacketType::TopicStatistics:
333  decodeTopicStatistics(message, source_info);
334  break;
335  case PacketType::WrappedPacket:
336  unwrap(message, source_info);
337  break;
338  case PacketType::ResendRequest:
339  decodeResendRequest(message, source_info);
340  break;
341  default:
342  ROS_WARN_STREAM("Unknown packet type: " << int(packet->type) << " from: " << source_info.node_name << " " << source_info.host << ":" << source_info.port);
343  }
344 }
345 
346 void UDPBridge::decodeData(std::vector<uint8_t> const &message, const SourceInfo& source_info)
347 {
348  const Packet *packet = reinterpret_cast<const Packet*>(message.data());
349 
350  auto remote_node = remote_nodes_[source_info.node_name];
351  if (remote_node)
352  {
353  auto payload_size = message.size() - sizeof(PacketHeader);
354 
355  MessageInternal outer_message;
356 
357  ros::serialization::IStream stream(const_cast<uint8_t*>(packet->data),payload_size);
358  ros::serialization::Serializer<MessageInternal>::read(stream, outer_message);
359 
360  auto type_info = remote_node->topicTypeInfos().find(outer_message.source_topic);
361  if(type_info != remote_node->topicTypeInfos().end())
362  {
363  topic_tools::ShapeShifter ss;
364  ss.morph(type_info->second.md5sum, type_info->second.datatype, type_info->second.message_definition, "");
365  ros::serialization::IStream message_stream(outer_message.data.data(), outer_message.data.size());
366  ss.read(message_stream);
367  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("decoded message of type: " << ss.getDataType() << " and size: " << ss.size());
368 
369 
370  // publish, but first advertise if publisher not present
371  auto topic = type_info->second.destination_topic;
372  if(topic.empty())
373  topic = type_info->second.source_topic;
374  if (m_publishers.find(topic) == m_publishers.end())
375  {
376  m_publishers[topic] = ss.advertise(m_nodeHandle, topic, 1);
377  sendBridgeInfo();
378  }
379 
380  m_publishers[topic].publish(ss);
381  }
382  else
383  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("no info yet for " << source_info.node_name << " " << outer_message.source_topic);
384  }
385 }
386 
387 void UDPBridge::decodeTopicTypeInfo(std::vector<uint8_t> const &message, const SourceInfo& source_info)
388 {
389  const Packet* packet = reinterpret_cast<const Packet*>(message.data());
390 
391  ros::serialization::IStream stream(const_cast<uint8_t*>(packet->data),message.size()-sizeof(PacketHeader));
392 
393  TopicTypeInfo type_info;
394  ros::serialization::Serializer<TopicTypeInfo>::read(stream, type_info);
395 
396  auto remote_node = remote_nodes_[source_info.node_name];
397  if(remote_node)
398  {
399  remote_node->topicTypeInfos()[type_info.source_topic] = type_info;
400  }
401 }
402 
403 void UDPBridge::decodeBridgeInfo(std::vector<uint8_t> const &message, const SourceInfo& source_info)
404 {
405  const Packet* packet = reinterpret_cast<const Packet*>(message.data());
406 
407  ros::serialization::IStream stream(const_cast<uint8_t*>(packet->data),message.size()-sizeof(PacketHeader));
408 
409  BridgeInfo bridge_info;
410  try
411  {
412  ros::serialization::Serializer<BridgeInfo>::read(stream, bridge_info);
413  }
414  catch(const std::exception& e)
415  {
416  ROS_WARN_STREAM("Error decoding BridgeInfo: " << e.what());
417  return;
418  }
419 
420  auto remote_node = remote_nodes_[source_info.node_name];
421  if(!remote_node)
422  {
423  remote_node = std::make_shared<RemoteNode>(source_info.node_name, name_);
424  remote_nodes_[source_info.node_name] = remote_node;
425  }
426  remote_node->update(bridge_info, source_info);
427 
428 }
429 
430 void UDPBridge::decodeResendRequest(std::vector<uint8_t> const &message, const SourceInfo& source_info)
431 {
432  const Packet* packet = reinterpret_cast<const Packet*>(message.data());
433 
434  ros::serialization::IStream stream(const_cast<uint8_t*>(packet->data),message.size()-sizeof(PacketHeader));
435 
436  ResendRequest rr;
437  ros::serialization::Serializer<ResendRequest>::read(stream, rr);
438 
439  auto remote_node = remote_nodes_[source_info.node_name];
440  if(remote_node)
441  {
442  for(auto packet_number: rr.missing_packets)
443  for(auto connection: remote_node->connections())
444  {
445  auto packet_to_resend = connection->sentPackets().find(packet_number);
446  if(packet_to_resend != connection->sentPackets().end())
447  send(packet_to_resend->second.packet, connection->socket_address());
448  }
449  }
450 }
451 
452 void UDPBridge::decodeTopicStatistics(std::vector<uint8_t> const &message, const SourceInfo& source_info)
453 {
454  const Packet* packet = reinterpret_cast<const Packet*>(message.data());
455 
456  ros::serialization::IStream stream(const_cast<uint8_t*>(packet->data),message.size()-sizeof(PacketHeader));
457 
458  TopicStatisticsArray topic_statistics;
459  ros::serialization::Serializer<TopicStatisticsArray>::read(stream, topic_statistics);
460 
461  auto remote = remote_nodes_[source_info.node_name];
462  if(remote)
463  remote->publishTopicStatistics(topic_statistics);
464 }

466 
467 void UDPBridge::addSubscriberConnection(std::string const &source_topic, std::string const &destination_topic, uint32_t queue_size, float period, std::string remote_node, std::string connection_id)
468 {
469  if(!remote_node.empty())
470  {
471  if(m_subscribers.find(source_topic) == m_subscribers.end())
472  {
473  boost::function<void(const topic_tools::ShapeShifter::ConstPtr&) > cb = [source_topic,this](const topic_tools::ShapeShifter::ConstPtr& msg)
474  {
475  this->callback(msg, source_topic);
476  };
477 
478  queue_size = std::max(queue_size, uint32_t(1));
479 
480  m_subscribers[source_topic].subscriber = m_nodeHandle.subscribe(source_topic, queue_size, cb);
481  }
482  m_subscribers[source_topic].remote_connections[std::make_pair(remote_node,connection_id)] = RemoteDetails(destination_topic, period);
483  sendBridgeInfo();
484  }
485 }
486 
487 void UDPBridge::decodeSubscribeRequest(std::vector<uint8_t> const &message, const SourceInfo& source_info)
488 {
489  const Packet* packet = reinterpret_cast<const Packet*>(message.data());
490 
491  ros::serialization::IStream stream(const_cast<uint8_t*>(packet->data),message.size()-sizeof(PacketHeader));
492 
493  RemoteSubscribeInternal remote_request;
494  ros::serialization::Serializer<RemoteSubscribeInternal>::read(stream, remote_request);
495 
496  addSubscriberConnection(remote_request.source_topic, remote_request.destination_topic, remote_request.queue_size, remote_request.period, source_info.node_name, remote_request.connection_id);
497 }
498 
499 void UDPBridge::unwrap(const std::vector<uint8_t>& message, const SourceInfo& source_info)
500 {
501  if(message.size() > sizeof(SequencedPacketHeader))
502  {
503  const SequencedPacket* wrapped_packet = reinterpret_cast<const SequencedPacket*>(message.data());
504 
505  auto remote_iterator = remote_nodes_.find(wrapped_packet->source_node);
506  std::shared_ptr<RemoteNode> remote;
507  if(remote_iterator != remote_nodes_.end())
508  remote = remote_iterator->second;
509 
510  auto updated_source_info = source_info;
511  updated_source_info.node_name = wrapped_packet->source_node;
512 
513  if(!remote)
514  {
515  remote = std::make_shared<RemoteNode>(wrapped_packet->source_node, name_);
516  remote_nodes_[wrapped_packet->source_node] = remote;
517  }
518  try
519  {
520  decode(remote->unwrap(message, updated_source_info), updated_source_info);
521  }
522  catch(const std::exception& e)
523  {
524  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("problem decoding packet: " << e.what());
525  }
526  }
527  else
528  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Incomplete wrapped packet of size: " << message.size());
529 }
530 
531 
532 void UDPBridge::resendMissingPackets()
533 {
534  for(auto remote: remote_nodes_)
535  if(remote.second)
536  {
537  auto rr = remote.second->getMissingPackets();
538  if(!rr.missing_packets.empty())
539  overhead_statistics_.add(send(rr, remote.first));
540  }
541 }
542 
543 
544 template <typename MessageType> SizeData UDPBridge::send(MessageType const &message, const RemoteConnectionsList& remotes)
545 {
546  auto serial_size = ros::serialization::serializationLength(message);
547 
548  std::vector<uint8_t> packet_data(sizeof(PacketHeader)+serial_size);
549  Packet * packet = reinterpret_cast<Packet *>(packet_data.data());
550  ros::serialization::OStream stream(packet->data, serial_size);
551  ros::serialization::serialize(stream,message);
552  packet->type = packetTypeOf(message);
553 
554  auto packet_size = packet_data.size();
555 
556  packet_data = compress(packet_data);
557 
558  auto fragments = fragment(packet_data);
559  auto size_data = send(fragments, remotes);
560 
561  size_data.message_size = serial_size;
562  size_data.packet_size = packet_size;
563  size_data.compressed_packet_size = packet_data.size();
564  size_data.fragment_count = fragments.size();
565  return size_data;
566 }
567 
568 template <typename MessageType> SizeData UDPBridge::send(MessageType const &message, const std::string& remote)
569 {
570  RemoteConnectionsList rcl;
571  rcl[remote];
572  return send(message, rcl);
573 }
574 
575 
576 // wrap and send a series of packets that should be sent as a group, such as fragments.
577 template<> SizeData UDPBridge::send(const std::vector<std::vector<uint8_t> >& data, const RemoteConnectionsList& remotes)
578 {
579  SizeData size_data;
580  std::vector<WrappedPacket> wrapped_packets;
581  for(auto packet: data)
582  {
583  uint64_t packet_number = next_packet_number_++;
584  last_packet_number_assign_time_ = ros::Time::now();
585  wrapped_packets.push_back(WrappedPacket(packet_number, packet));
586  size_data.sent_size += wrapped_packets.back().packet.size();
587  }
588 
589  if(!wrapped_packets.empty())
590  {
591  size_data.timestamp = wrapped_packets.front().timestamp;
592  for(auto remote: remotes)
593  {
594  auto remote_node = remote_nodes_[remote.first];
595  if(remote_node)
596  {
597  std::vector<std::shared_ptr<Connection> > connections;
598  if(remote.second.empty())
599  connections = remote_node->connections();
600  else
601  for(auto connection_id: remote.second)
602  connections.push_back(remote_node->connection(connection_id));
603  for(auto connection: connections)
604  if(connection && !connection->host().empty())
605  {
606  SendResult result;
607  result.sent_success = false;
608  result.dropped = false;
609  if(connection->can_send(size_data.sent_size, wrapped_packets.front().timestamp.toSec()))
610  {
611  result.sent_success = true;
612  for(auto packet: wrapped_packets)
613  {
614  connection->sentPackets()[packet.packet_number] = WrappedPacket(packet, name_, connection->id());
615  if(send(connection->sentPackets()[packet.packet_number].packet, connection->socket_address()) != packet.packet_size)
616  result.sent_success = false;
617  }
618  }
619  else
620  result.dropped = true;
621  size_data.send_results[remote.first][connection->id()]=result;
622  }
623 
624  }
625  }
626  }
627 
628  return size_data;
629 }
630 
631 void UDPBridge::cleanupSentPackets()
632 {
633  auto now = ros::Time::now();
634  if(now.isValid && !now.isZero())
635  {
636  auto old_enough = now - ros::Duration(3.0);
637  for(auto remote: remote_nodes_)
638  if(remote.second)
639  for(auto connection: remote.second->connections())
640  if(connection)
641  {
642  std::vector<uint64_t> expired;
643  for(auto sp: connection->sentPackets())
644  if(sp.second.timestamp < old_enough)
645  expired.push_back(sp.first);
646  for(auto e: expired)
647  connection->sentPackets().erase(e);
648  }
649  }
650 }
651 
652 int UDPBridge::send(const std::vector<uint8_t> &data, const sockaddr_in* address)
653 {
654  int bytes_sent = 0;
655  try
656  {
657  int tries = 0;
658  while (true)
659  {
660  pollfd p;
661  p.fd = m_socket;
662  p.events = POLLOUT;
663  int ret = poll(&p, 1, 10);
664  if(ret > 0 && p.revents & POLLOUT)
665  {
666  bytes_sent = sendto(m_socket, data.data(), data.size(), 0, reinterpret_cast<const sockaddr*>(address), sizeof(*address));
667  if(bytes_sent == -1)
668  switch(errno)
669  {
670  case EAGAIN:
671  tries+=1;
672  break;
673  case ECONNREFUSED:
674  return bytes_sent;
675  default:
676  throw(ConnectionException(strerror(errno)));
677  }
678  if(bytes_sent < data.size())
679  throw(ConnectionException("only "+std::to_string(bytes_sent) +" of " +std::to_string(data.size()) + " sent"));
680  else
681  break;
682  }
683  else
684  tries+=1;
685 
686  if(tries >= 20)
687  if(ret == 0)
688  throw(ConnectionException("Timeout"));
689  else
690  throw(ConnectionException(std::to_string(errno) +": "+ strerror(errno)));
691  }
692  return bytes_sent;
693  }
694  catch(const ConnectionException& e)
695  {
696  ROS_WARN_STREAM("error sending data of size " << data.size() << ": " << e.getMessage());
697  }
698  return bytes_sent;
699 }
700 
701 
702 bool UDPBridge::remoteSubscribe(udp_bridge::Subscribe::Request &request, udp_bridge::Subscribe::Response &response)
703 {
704  ROS_INFO_STREAM("subscribe: remote: " << request.remote << ":" << " connection: " << request.connection_id << " source topic: " << request.source_topic << " destination topic: " << request.destination_topic);
705 
706  udp_bridge::RemoteSubscribeInternal remote_request;
707  remote_request.source_topic = request.source_topic;
708  remote_request.destination_topic = request.destination_topic;
709  remote_request.queue_size = request.queue_size;
710  remote_request.period = request.period;
711  remote_request.connection_id = request.connection_id;
712 
713  auto ret = send(remote_request, request.remote);
714  overhead_statistics_.add(ret);
715  return ret.send_results[request.remote][request.connection_id].sent_success;
716 }
717 
718 bool UDPBridge::remoteAdvertise(udp_bridge::Subscribe::Request &request, udp_bridge::Subscribe::Response &response)
719 {
720  auto remote = remote_nodes_[request.remote];
721  if(!remote)
722  return false;
723  auto connection = remote->connection(request.connection_id);
724  if(!connection)
725  return false;
726 
727  addSubscriberConnection(request.source_topic, request.destination_topic, request.queue_size, request.period, request.remote, request.connection_id);
728  sendBridgeInfo();
729  return true;
730 }
731 
732 void UDPBridge::statsReportCallback(ros::TimerEvent const &event)
733 {
734  ros::Time now = ros::Time::now();
735  TopicStatisticsArray tsa;
736  for(auto &subscriber: m_subscribers)
737  {
738  for(auto ts: subscriber.second.statistics.get())
739  {
740  ts.source_node = name_;
741  ts.source_topic = subscriber.first;
742  auto remote_pair = std::make_pair(ts.destination_node, ts.connection_id);
743  auto ci = subscriber.second.remote_connections.find(remote_pair);
744  if(ci != subscriber.second.remote_connections.end())
745  ts.destination_topic = ci->second.destination_topic;
746  tsa.topics.push_back(ts);
747  }
748  }
749 
750  for(auto ts: overhead_statistics_.get())
751  {
752  ts.source_node = name_;
753  tsa.topics.push_back(ts);
754  }
755 
756  m_topicStatisticsPublisher.publish(tsa);
757 
758  overhead_statistics_.add(send(tsa, allRemotes()));
759 }
760 
761 std::vector<std::vector<uint8_t> > UDPBridge::fragment(const std::vector<uint8_t>& data)
762 {
763  std::vector<std::vector<uint8_t> > ret;
764 
765  unsigned long max_fragment_payload_size = m_max_packet_size-(sizeof(FragmentHeader)+sizeof(SequencedPacketHeader));
766  if(data.size()+sizeof(SequencedPacketHeader) > m_max_packet_size)
767  {
768  for(unsigned long i = 0; i < data.size(); i += max_fragment_payload_size)
769  {
770  unsigned long fragment_data_size = std::min(max_fragment_payload_size, data.size()-i);
771  ret.push_back(std::vector<uint8_t>(sizeof(FragmentHeader)+fragment_data_size));
772  Fragment * fragment_packet = reinterpret_cast<Fragment*>(ret.back().data());
773  fragment_packet->type = PacketType::Fragment;
774  fragment_packet->packet_id = next_fragmented_packet_id_;
775  fragment_packet->fragment_number = ret.size();
776  memcpy(fragment_packet->fragment_data, &data.at(i), fragment_data_size);
777  }
778  for(auto & fragment_vector: ret)
779  reinterpret_cast<Fragment*>(fragment_vector.data())->fragment_count = ret.size();
780  next_fragmented_packet_id_++;
781  if(ret.size() > std::numeric_limits<uint16_t>::max())
782  {
783  ROS_WARN_STREAM("Dropping " << ret.size() << " fragments, max frag count:" << std::numeric_limits<uint16_t>::max());
784  return {};
785  }
786  }
787  if(ret.empty())
788  ret.push_back(data);
789  return ret;
790 }
791 
792 void UDPBridge::bridgeInfoCallback(ros::TimerEvent const &event)
793 {
794  sendBridgeInfo();
795 }
796 
797 void UDPBridge::sendBridgeInfo()
798 {
799  BridgeInfo bi;
800  bi.stamp = ros::Time::now();
801  bi.name = name_;
802  ros::master::V_TopicInfo topics;
803  ros::master::getTopics(topics);
804  for(auto mti: topics)
805  {
806  TopicInfo ti;
807  ti.topic = mti.name;
808  ti.datatype = mti.datatype;
809  if (m_subscribers.find(mti.name) != m_subscribers.end())
810  {
811  for(auto r: m_subscribers[mti.name].remote_connections)
812  {
813  TopicRemoteDetails trd;
814  trd.remote = r.first.first;
815  trd.connection_id = r.first.second;
816  trd.destination_topic = r.second.destination_topic;
817  trd.period = r.second.period;
818  ti.remotes.push_back(trd);
819  }
820  }
821  bi.topics.push_back(ti);
822  }
823 
824  for(auto remote_node: remote_nodes_)
825  if(remote_node.second)
826  {
827  udp_bridge::Remote remote;
828  remote.name = remote_node.first;
829  remote.topic_name = remote_node.second->topicName();
830  for(auto connection: remote_node.second->connections())
831  if(connection)
832  {
833  RemoteConnection rc;
834  rc.connection_id = connection->id();
835  rc.host = connection->host();
836  rc.port = connection->port();
837  rc.ip_address = connection->ip_address();
838  rc.return_host = connection->returnHost();
839  rc.return_port = connection->returnPort();
840  auto receive_rates = connection->data_receive_rate(bi.stamp.toSec());
841  rc.received_bytes_per_second = receive_rates.first + receive_rates.second;
842  rc.duplicate_bytes_per_second = receive_rates.second;
843  remote.connections.push_back(rc);
844  }
845  bi.remotes.push_back(remote);
846  }
847 
848  bi.next_packet_number = next_packet_number_;
849  bi.last_packet_time = last_packet_number_assign_time_;
850 
851  m_bridge_info_publisher.publish(bi);
852 
853  overhead_statistics_.add(send(bi, allRemotes()));
854 }
855 
856 bool UDPBridge::addRemote(udp_bridge::AddRemote::Request &request, udp_bridge::AddRemote::Response &response)
857 {
858  auto remote = remote_nodes_[request.name];
859  if(!remote)
860  {
861  remote = std::make_shared<RemoteNode>(request.name, name_);
862  remote_nodes_[request.name] = remote;
863  }
864 
865  uint16_t port = 4200;
866  if (request.port != 0)
867  port = request.port;
868 
869  auto connection = remote->connection(request.connection_id);
870  if(!connection)
871  {
872  connection = remote->newConnection(request.connection_id, request.address, port);
873  remote->connections().push_back(connection);
874  }
875  connection->setHostAndPort(request.address, request.port);
876  connection->setReturnHostAndPort(request.return_address, request.return_port);
877 
878  sendBridgeInfo();
879  return true;
880 }
881 
882 bool UDPBridge::listRemotes(udp_bridge::ListRemotes::Request &request, udp_bridge::ListRemotes::Response &response)
883 {
884  for(auto remote: remote_nodes_)
885  if(remote.second)
886  {
887  Remote r;
888  r.name = remote.first;
889  r.topic_name = remote.second->topicName();
890  for(auto connection: remote.second->connections())
891  if(connection)
892  {
893  RemoteConnection rc;
894  rc.connection_id = connection->id();
895  rc.host = connection->host();
896  rc.port = connection->port();
897  rc.ip_address = connection->ip_address();
898  rc.return_host = connection->returnHost();
899  rc.return_port = connection->returnPort();
900  r.connections.push_back(rc);
901  }
902  response.remotes.push_back(r);
903  }
904  return true;
905 }
906 
907 UDPBridge::RemoteConnectionsList UDPBridge::allRemotes() const
908 {
909  RemoteConnectionsList ret;
910  for(auto remote: remote_nodes_)
911  if(remote.second)
912  ret[remote.first];
913  return ret;
914 }
